backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing access control, user profiles, premium subscriptions, template posts, and likes with associated authorization checks.
backend/migration_types.mo: Defines OldActor and NewActor state types, adding optional customization settings in the new version.
backend/migration.mo: Migration script that sets the new appCustomizationSettings field to null when upgrading actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base configuration defining theme variables and light/dark mode color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the app’s router with routes for feed, post, compose, premium, and admin pages under a themed layout.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header with branding, navigation buttons, and authentication/profile controls.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Root layout wrapping pages with header, outlet, profile setup dialog, and footer.
frontend/src/components/AuthGuard.tsx: Provides a hook and component to enforce authentication before performing protected actions.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Renders a card view for a template post with author info, preview, tags, and actions for liking, reposting, and sharing.
frontend/src/components/ProfileMenu.tsx: Dropdown menu showing the current user’s profile with premium/admin options and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Dialog prompting new authenticated users to set a username and full name, submitting via a profile save mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refetches dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Hooks for checking admin status and performing admin login/logout using the actor with toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Fetches the caller’s user profile and exposes authentication state and principal info.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomizationSetti: Hooks to load and save user customization settings via the actor, with query invalidation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and utilities for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/usePremiumSubscriptio: Hooks for getting premium status and upgrading or canceling premium subscriptions with query updates and toasts.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query mutation hooks for saving user profiles, liking posts, and reposting templates with toast notifications.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light/dark themes and global utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app root with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Implements the admin panel with authentication, admin login, and customization settings management.
frontend/src/pages/ComposePage.tsx: Provides a form for creating new template posts with validation, mock submission, and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Renders a mock feed of template posts with like and repost interactions and tab navigation.
frontend/src/pages/PostDetailPage.tsx: Displays a detailed view of a single template post with author info and like/repost actions using mock data.
frontend/src/pages/PremiumPage.tsx: UI page showing Premium plan details, authentication gate, feature list, and upgrade/cancel actions using subscription hooks.
frontend/src/types/post.ts: Defines the TemplatePost interface with metadata, engagement stats, and optional tags and preview image.
frontend/src/utils/shareToAlightMotion.t: Attempts to open a deep link for Alight Motion and falls back to copying the template link with toast notifications.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing features, requirements, notes, and versioning for the Alight Motion template app.
